content: i work in my little shed shop in the summertime selling yarn and finished knitwear it s often too warm for heavy knits during the summer months while i am there but i find myself still wanting to wear knits to showcase the great selection of yarn i sell i created this pattern to have a cute little worsted weight neck scarf that goes with linen dresses or t-shirts without making me feel too hot i sized it to be similar to wearing a cotton bandana specifically i wanted to have this scarf work with one skein or less of the worsted weight yarns we carry malabrigo rios and worsted as well as baah shasta are great yarns for this pattern it s a simple pattern great for beginners the pattern is written for one size but can easily be made longer if desired i hope you enjoy knitting this little scarf yarn for this pattern can be found on my website www northroadknits com
